name: HH_ALERT_INFO_OT
description: This table stores the overtime information for Home Health Alerts.

columns.name: ALERT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the alert record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: NUM
columns.description: This is the contact number for home health alerts.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_NAME
columns.description: The user-configured name of the alert.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_ACTIVE
columns.description: The override for the active status of the alert.

columns.name: REC_INTVL_OVERRIDE
columns.description: The user-configured recurrence interval of the alert.

columns.name: REMINDER_OFFSET
columns.description: The user-configured reminder offset for the alert.

columns.name: NUM_DAYS_ACTIVE_OVERRIDE
columns.description: The user-configured number of days active for the alert.

columns.name: HIGH_PRIORITY_OFFSET_OVERRIDE
columns.description: The user-configured offset value for the alert.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the note associated with the alert.
